FlavorTextOption.Text: Capito

Benvenuti a Galactic Civilizations IV. Oggi esamineremo i primi passi dell'umanità dopo aver raggiunto il viaggio Più Veloce della Luce. Una volta che la Terra Unita decise di iniziare la colonizzazione di altri pianeti, creò un'organizzazione chiamata Alleanza Terrestre per supervisionare l'impresa. La sua prima missione era esplorare lo spazio per cercare potenziali candidati alla colonizzazione. [BR][BR]Esplorare e conoscere la galassia è il primo passo per espandere la [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zona di Controllo[/HS] dell'Alleanza. Le sonde sono il miglior modo per esplorare l'universo. Hanno [HS=HS_ShipRange]Autonomia[/HS] illimitata e possono muoversi rapidamente.[BR][BR][I]I tuoi rapporti di missione appariranno sul lato SINISTRO dello schermo con icone arancioni. Clicca SINISTRAMENTE su una per esaminarla.[/I][BR][BR]Una sonda spaziale profonda è stata di recente lanciata in orbita terrestre. Seleziona questa sonda usando il pulsante SINISTRO del mouse e dai le istruzioni per [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Muoversi[/HS] per iniziare l'esplorazione. Questo può essere fatto selezionando dove la sonda dovrebbe muoversi sulla mappa con il pulsante DESTRO del mouse o selezionando la modalità [ICON=AutoExplore_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoExplore]Esplorazione Automatica[/HS] nell'interfaccia della sonda. Un [HS=HS_Months]Mese[/HS] può essere concluso solo quando tutte le navi e flotte hanno utilizzato tutte le loro mosse o sono state messe in Attesa.[BR][BR]Ci sono state segnalazioni di segnali insoliti. La loro fonte e significato sono troppo deboli per essere individuati, ma si ritiene possano essere di un'altra Civiltà. Usa la sonda per trovarli.[BR][BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Localizza l'Altra Civiltà

Probe selected! The ship is ready to receive orders. Directing ships around the galaxy is vital to success. Give the Probe its first order to [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move[/HS].[BR][BR]With the Probe selected, set a destination by clicking the RIGHT Mouse Button with the mouse over an unoccupied space. The Probe will then utilize the most direct route to that location by going from one [HS=HS_Tile]Tile[/HS] to another.[BR][BR]If you do not see the Grid, you can set Grid visibility in the Options Menu under Interface. You can also cycle through Grid visibility by pressing the G key.

Success![BR][BR]While exploring the [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS], keep in mind all ships are limited to how far they can move in one [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS]. All Ships have a set amount of [ICON=Moves_Icon] [HS=HS_Moves]Moves[/HS] that represents how many [HS=HS_Tile]Tiles[/HS] they can traverse in one turn.[BR][BR]If you give an order that is further than a ship can move in a single [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS], it will continue to follow those orders over the number of [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] necessary to reach the set location.

Commander, The next thing that needs your attention is ensuring the [HS=HS_ResearchCenter]Research Center[/HS] has an active goal.[BR][BR]While there are multiple choices, focusing on [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] that enhance our exploration abilities such as Survey Missions is advised. Access the Research Center by selecting the Research Bar with the LEFT Mouse Button.[BR][BR]New Objective: Research Survey Missions

Welcome to the [HS=HS_ResearchCenter]Research Center[/HS]. This is where you direct research efforts to unlock new [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS]. Completing [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] is how you gain access to new ships, buildings, management elements, and more.[BR][BR]The screen has three sections—the Advisor Suggestions in the middle, the current [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] being researched is at the bottom and all [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] that can be researched listed in the panel on the right.[BR][BR]Selecting a [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] with the LEFT Mouse Button will set it as the current research target. Try setting a research target now. It's advised to start with Survey Missions.

Research target set![BR][BR]All [HS=HS_Tech]Techs[/HS] require an amount of [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS]. Every [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS] a set amount of [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] is generated and applied to the target [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS].[BR][BR]Primarily, this concerns you regarding how long it will take to complete research. You can see the number of [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] a [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] will take in its listing. The number of remaining [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] is listed on the Research Bar.[BR][BR]Ways to increase the amount of [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] generated per [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS] will be covered as the Terran Alliance expands.

Research into Survey Missions complete, we've gained a [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ships[/HS] will prove vital to exploring the galaxy. [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ships[/HS] have the module necessary to investigate [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS].[BR][BR]An [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] is an object in space that's unclear, abandoned, or obtuse. Uncovering an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] can prove beneficial but can also be dangerous. Survey an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] using the new [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS].[BR][BR]New Objective: Scan an Anomaly

Research into Survey Missions complete, we've gained a [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ships[/HS] will prove vital to exploring the galaxy. [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ships[/HS] have the module necessary to investigate [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalies[/HS].[BR][BR]An [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] is an object in space that's unclear, abandoned, or obtuse. Uncovering an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] can prove beneficial but can also be dangerous. Survey an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] using the new [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Research Survey Missions[BR]New Objective: Scan an Anomaly

It's the start of a new [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS]. Another duty often requiring your attention is managing our [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS]. A [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS] is any planet with a [HS=HS_Leaders]Leader[/HS] in charge. Right now, that's just our Homeworld, Earth. As the Alliance expands, we'll need to talk about [HS=HS_Leaders]Leaders[/HS] more and how to establish a [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core World[/HS], but for now, let's focus on Earth.[BR][BR]Access the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] [HS=HS_PlanetManagement]Planet Management Window[/HS] by selecting Earth with the LEFT Mouse Button and then pressing the [ICON=Menu_PlanetManagement_Icon] [HS=HS_PlanetManagement]Planet Management[/HS] button.[BR][BR]New Objective: Build 2 Planetary Improvements

On this screen, you can see everything relevant to the planet. Right now, we're concerned with planning Improvements. Improvements can have several beneficial effects; the most common is how they affect Planetary Output. [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS], [ICON=Stat_Research_Icon] [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS], [ICON=Stat_Income_Icon] [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS], [ICON=Stat_Food_Icon] [HS=HS_Food]Food[/HS], and [ICON=Stat_Influence_Icon] [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] all have their own impact on the Alliance. Improving the Output will have beneficial effects.[BR][BR]Try placing the Capital City Improvement for Earth on an open tile. You can do this by holding the LEFT Mouse Button on a unique Improvement from the right-hand panel and dragging it to a tile before releasing the LEFT Mouse Button.

Placement confirmed, Commander. As you place additional Improvements and Districts, it's important to know about [HS=HS_Adjacency]Adjacency Bonuses[/HS]. All Improvements and Districts have specific effects based on their level. You can increase the level by building something with an Adjacency bonus that applies to the bonuses an Improvement provides.[BR][BR]Another way to get more from your Improvements and increase their level is to build on top of Tiles with an existing benefit. Building similar structures close together on tiles that match their benefit will often yield the best results.[BR][BR]You can plan ahead by placing the plans for several Improvements or Districts at a time. The order construction will be complete is visible in the Build Queue, which you can rearrange as needed.[BR][BR]Plan some Districts by clicking on a tile with the LEFT Mouse Button and then selecting a District from the list of available options.

Colonies report that another Planetary Improvement has been completed. It may only be a start, but every completed Improvement increases our proficiency. We should remember to celebrate the small victories sometimes.[BR][BR]You'll need to continue to manage the [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS]. If you don't like the location of an Improvement or District, you can use the Deconstruct order to clear the tile. Select the tile and then select the Destroy Improvement option.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Build 2 Planetary Improvements

Commander, having made contact with the Drengin, we can confirm they're the source of the mysterious signal.[BR][BR]We've no additional information on them. It's advisable to approach them carefully and keep diplomatic relations positive. We've had enough problems with the Pirates around this [HS=HS_Sector]Sector[/HS].[BR][BR]Even if we're not making it an active objective, we should continue to explore to help complete our other objectives.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Explore the Sector

Commander, you can end your turn once you've addressed all outstanding issues.[BR][BR]There are only so many things that can be done in a Month, the measure of a [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS]. When all issues that need attention have been acknowledged or addressed, you can pass the [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS] and progress to the next month to start a new [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS].[BR][BR]You can Pass the [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS] by pressing the Turn Button or by pressing the TAB key.[BR][BR]When you're ready, Pass the turn; there will be plenty more to address next [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS].

È necessario tenere d'occhio i Drengin. Ciononostante, dobbiamo continuare a proteggere il [HS=HS_Sector]Settore[/HS].[BR][BR]Le [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Navi Insegna[/HS] sono un elemento cruciale per esplorare la galassia. Le [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Navi Insegna[/HS] possono essere più lente delle Sonde e hanno un [HS=HS_ShipRange]Raggio d'Azione[/HS] limitato, ma sono in grado di difendersi. Più importante, le [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Navi Insegna[/HS] possono essere utilizzate per indagare le [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalie[/HS].[BR][BR]Le [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalie[/HS] assumono molte forme, ma possono tutte essere scandagliate da una [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Nave Insegna[/HS]. Un [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Sopralluogo[/HS] richiede alcuni [HS=HS_Months]Mesi[/HS] per essere completato, ma spesso rivela risorse, componenti o tecnologie vantaggiose una volta terminato.[BR][BR]Una [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Nave Insegna[/HS] può essere ordinata di [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Effettuare un Sopralluogo[/HS] di un'[HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalia[/HS] comandandola alla posizione dell'[HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalia[/HS] o utilizzando la funzione [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Auto-Sopralluogo[/HS] della nave.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Localizzare l'Altra Civiltà[BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Scansionare un'Anomalia

[HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] selected and ready for orders. Directing a [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] to [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] is much like ordering the ship to [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Move Order[/HS].[BR][BR]With the [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] selected, select an [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] to [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] by selecting it with the RIGHT Mouse Button. Doing so will set the [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] as the ship's target. The [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] will then move to the [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS] and, once at the destination, begin the [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS].

[HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] reports reaching its destination. The [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] will now begin to [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Survey[/HS] the target [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS].[BR][BR][HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Surveying[/HS] takes several [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] to complete. If the [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] is interrupted by being given another order, they will lose progress in uncovering the [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomaly[/HS].[BR][BR]There's more to manage while the [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ship[/HS] works. If you want to check the [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Flag Ships[/HS] progress, select the ship; the number of [HS=HS_Months]Turns[/HS] remaining will be detailed on the selected panel.

La [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Nave Ammiraglia[/HS] ha terminato di [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]esplorare[/HS] un'[HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalia[/HS]. Ora, è il momento di affrontare ciò che è stato scoperto. Non ogni [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalia[/HS] sarà sicura o puramente benefica, ma il rischio vale la ricompensa. [BR][BR]Le [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Navi Ammiraglie[/HS] possono essere impostate per lavorare automaticamente. Per far esplorare e scoprire [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalie[/HS] da una [HS=HS_SurveyShip]Nave Ammiraglia[/HS] senza direzioni costanti, usa la modalità [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Esplorazione Automatica[/HS]. Attiva o disattiva la modalità [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Esplorazione Automatica[/HS] selezionando la nave e premendo il pulsante [ICON=AutoSurvey_Icon] [HS=HS_AutoSurvey]Esplorazione Automatica[/HS] accanto al pannello selezionato.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Scansiona un'Anomalia[BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Scansiona 5 Anomalie

Abbiamo completato l'obiettivo di [HS=HS_SurveyOrder]Esplorare[/HS] 5 [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalie[/HS]. Ognuna è stata un'esperienza diversa, anche se non tutte erano sicure. Anche se non è un obiettivo, continuare a scandagliare [HS=HS_Anomaly]Anomalie[/HS] si rivelerà vantaggioso.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Scansiona 5 Anomalie

Le colonie non sono l'unico modo per ottenere risorse o espandere la [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zona di Controllo[/HS] dell'Alleanza. Con la giusta [HS=HS_Tech]Tecnologia[/HS] possiamo costruire [HS=HS_Starbase]Stazioni Spaziali[/HS].[BR][BR]Le [HS=HS_Starbase]Stazioni Spaziali[/HS] si dividono in quattro tipi, ognuno con una specializzazione diversa. I quattro tipi di [HS=HS_Starbase]Stazione Spaziale[/HS] sono: [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Militare[/HS], [ICON=Icon_MiningStarbase] [HS=HS_MiningStarbase]Mineraria[/HS], [ICON=Icon_EconomicsStarbase] [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economica[/HS] e [ICON=Icon_CommunicationsStarbase] [HS=HS_CommunicationsStarbase]Comunicazione[/HS].[BR][BR]Prima di tutto, dobbiamo ricercare la Tecnologia delle [HS=HS_Tech]Stazioni Spaziali[/HS].[BR][BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Ricerca Stazioni Spaziali

As the Alliance expands, it's important to increase the [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] value of [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS]. Building Manufacturing Districts on [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] is one way to increase the value, but that often causes an increase in [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS].[BR][BR]Increasing the [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Mineral[/HS] input to a planet will also increase [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS]. Space is full of floating rocks that could be mined for [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerals[/HS]. Unlocking the ability to mine asteroids would allow the Alliance to increase the [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] of [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] without increasing [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS].[BR][BR]New Objective: Research Asteroid Mining

L'Alleanza ha perfezionato la Tecnologia di Estrazione [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] degli Asteroidi. Ora sono disponibili Minatori di Asteroidi per avviare operazioni di estrazione.[BR][BR]Una miniera di asteroidi aumenta la [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Produzione[/HS] di un [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] fornendo [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerali[/HS]. Una miniera di asteroidi può supportare solo un singolo [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS].[BR][BR]Per iniziare l'estrazione degli asteroidi, [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Muovi[/HS] un Minatore di Asteroidi verso una cintura di asteroidi. Il Minatore di Asteroidi imposterà una miniera al suo arrivo nella cintura.[BR][BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Estrarre un Asteroide

L'Alleanza ha perfezionato la tecnologia di Estrazione degli Asteroidi [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS]. Ora sono disponibili Minatori di Asteroidi per avviare operazioni minerarie.[BR][BR]Una miniera asteroidale aumenta la [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Produzione[/HS] di un [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] fornendo [ICON=Stat_Minerals_Icon] [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerali[/HS]. Una miniera può supportare un solo [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS].[BR][BR]Per iniziare l'estrazione degli asteroidi, [HS=HS_ShipMovement]Muovi[/HS] un Minatore di Asteroidi verso una cintura di asteroidi. Il Minatore di Asteroidi imposterà una miniera al suo arrivo nella cintura.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Ricerca Estrazione Asteroidi[BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Estrarre un Asteroide

With the research into the Starbases [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] complete, we can build [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] at a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS]. [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] are used to build [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS]. There are several types of [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS] to take advantage of. Try building a few [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] at the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] and use them to build [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Research Starbases[BR]New Objective: Build an Economic Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Military Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Mining Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Communications Starbase

With the research into the Starbases [HS=HS_Tech]Tech[/HS] complete, we can build [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] at a [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS]. [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] are used to build [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS]. There are several types of [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS] to take advantage of. Try building a few [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] at the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] and use them to build [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS].[BR][BR]New Objective: Build an Economic Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Military Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Mining Starbase[BR]New Objective: Build a Communications Starbase

[HS=HS_Constructor]Constructor[/HS] selected and ready for orders. Positioning for [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] is critical. [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] are consumed when a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] is built.[BR][BR]To build a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS], press the [ICON=Order_ConstructStarbase] [HS=HS_ConstructStarbase]Construct Starbase[/HS] button by the selected panel. The [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS] will be built at the [HS=HS_Constructor]Constructors[/HS] current position.[BR][BR]Keep in mind that [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic Starbases[/HS] can only be built near [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Core Worlds[/HS] and [HS=HS_MiningStarbase]Mining Starbases[/HS] can only be built near unclaimed [HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS]. [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS] can not be built too close to another [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS], and they can not be built in another Civilizaton's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS].

First [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic Starbase[/HS] built. It will increase the [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Income_Icon] [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] of Colonies within its area of influence.[BR][BR]Upgrades for [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic Starbases[/HS] focus on further increasing the [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] or [ICON=Stat_Income_Icon] [HS=HS_ColonyGrossIncome]Income[/HS] of nearby Colonies. [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Economic Starbases[/HS] are a great way to speed up the rate at which construction is completed without increasing [HS=HS_Pollution]Pollution[/HS]. To get a list of affected Colonies, press the Manage button by the selected panel for a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Build an Economic Starbase

First [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military Starbase[/HS] built. It will increase the Attack and Defense of all ships and fleets within its area of effect. These [ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military Starbases[/HS] also tend to get more defensive and weapon-focused upgrades than other [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbases[/HS].[BR][BR][ICON=Icon_MiltaryStarbase] [HS=HS_MilitaryStarbase]Military Starbases[/HS] are great when built in areas where conflict regularly occurs and around Colonies to help fend off assaults. To get a list of affected Colonies, press the Manage button by the selected panel for a [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Build a Military Starbase

First [HS=HS_MiningStarbase]Mining Starbase[/HS] built. Any unclaimed [HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS] within the area of effect will be claimed by the new [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS]. Each turn, the [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS] will add an amount of the mined [HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS] to the Alliance's available resources. The amount mined can be increased by researching and applying upgrades to [HS=HS_MiningStarbase]Mining Starbases[/HS][BR][BR][HS=HS_StrategicResource]Strategic Resources[/HS] are important for constructing certain Planetary Improvements and Ships along with making certain upgrades.[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Build Mining Starbase

First [ICON=Icon_CommunicationsStarbase] [HS=HS_CommunicationsStarbase]Communications Starbase[/HS] built. The [HS=HS_Starbase]Starbase[/HS] will begin to increase [ICON=Stat_Influence_Icon] [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS]. [ICON=Icon_CommunicationsStarbase] [HS=HS_CommunicationsStarbase]Communications Starbases[/HS] are good for trying to lay early claim to an area or attempt to resist the spread of another Civilization's [ICON=Stat_Influence_Icon] [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] to keep their [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS] under control.[BR][BR] If a Colony ends up in another Civilization's [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS], it becomes at risk of being annexed. Each turn spent in a foreign [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS] reduces control over a Colony until it is annexed or the Colony brought back into your [HS=HS_ZoneOfControl]Zone of Control[/HS].[BR][BR]Completed Objective: Build a Communications Starbase

Con la [ICON=Icon_EconomicsStarbase] [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Base Stellare Economica[/HS] completata, il vicino [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] beneficerà di un impulso alla sua economia. La [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Base Stellare Economica[/HS] è solo uno dei tipi di [HS=HS_Starbase]Base Stellare[/HS] che possono essere costruiti. Ogni tipo ha uno scopo specifico che vale la pena comprendere a fondo.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Costruisci una Base Stellare Economica

Con la [ICON=Icon_EconomicsStarbase] [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Base Stellare Economica[/HS] completata, il vicino [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] riceverà un impulso alla sua economia. La [HS=HS_EconomicsStarbase]Base Stellare Economica[/HS] è solo uno dei tipi di [HS=HS_Starbase]Base Stellare[/HS] che possono essere costruiti. Ogni tipo ha uno scopo specifico che vale la pena comprendere.[BR][BR]Un altro metodo per beneficiare il [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] è attraverso l'Estrazione di Asteroidi. Questo richiede la [HS=HS_Tech]Tecnologia[/HS] di Estrazione di Asteroidi, disponibile nel [HS=HS_ResearchCenter]Centro Ricerche[/HS].[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Costruisci una Base Stellare Economica[BR]Nuovo Obiettivo: Ricerca Estrazione di Asteroidi

Miniera stabilita. Gli Asteroid Miners sono consumati per impostare la stazione mineraria. Quando una stazione mineraria è sviluppata, rivendica l'intera Fascia di Asteroidi e inizia a inviare risorse al più vicino [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS].[BR][BR]Incrementare la [ICON=Manufacturing_Stat_Icon] [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Produzione[/HS] di un [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] aumenta la velocità con cui vengono completati i miglioramenti e costruite le navi. Un [HS=HS_CoreWorld]Mondo Nucleo[/HS] ha vari tipi di input come [HS=HS_Minerals]Minerali[/HS], ogni input rappresenta un tipo di risorsa disponibile al pianeta che impatta positivamente la Produzione Pianetaria.[BR][BR]Obiettivo Completato: Estrarre un Asteroide

Before you end your [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS], make sure the [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] is working on constructing a new ship.[BR][BR]A [HS=HS_Shipyard]Shipyard[/HS] can't be allowed to idle and must be working on something at the end of every [HS=HS_Months]Turn[/HS].
